title: RFK Jr. - Anti-Vaccine Conspiracy Theorist as Health Secretary
summary: Trump appointed RFK Jr., one of the 'Disinformation Dozen' spreading COVID vaccine misinformation, as HHS Secretary. He fired all 17 CDC vaccine advisory panel members, replaced them with anti-vax activists, removed hepatitis B vaccine recommendations. Measles reached 20-year high, unvaccinated children died.
keyFacts: Named by Center for Countering Digital Hate as one of 'Disinformation Dozen' - leading spreaders of COVID vaccine misinformation
No medical degree, no public health experience
Promoted debunked theory linking vaccines to autism for decades
Changed CDC website to suggest vaccines might cause autism after promising not to
Fired all 17 members of CDC vaccine advisory panel (ACIP)
Replaced them with anti-vaccine activists and conspiracy theorists
New panel voted to remove hepatitis B vaccine recommendation for newborns
Measles cases reached nearly 20-year high in 2025; two unvaccinated children died in Texas
Pertussis cases rising; two unvaccinated children died in Kentucky
Nine former CDC directors condemned Kennedy: 'Endangering every American's health'
Article of impeachment filed against Kennedy in December 2025
